longInfo:
Passport required.  
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 6 months from date of arrival.

Visa required, except for For a max. stay of 30 days for
nationals of Iceland, traveling as tourists. 
Minors:
- Minors travelling accompanied by one parent or by a person
  other than parent/legal guardian . 
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Iceland will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- All visitors must hold sufficient funds and documents for
  next destination.
- Valid visa is allowed in an expired passport,
  
- For extension of stay visitor must apply personally at the
  Immigration Office.
Warning:
- Visitors must hold return/onward tickets
